characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per game, when the Painboy is attempting to heal a model using Dok's Tools, you may re-roll the dice, either when determining if the surgery is successful, or when calculating the number of wounds regained.  When rolling to wound this unit, always use the Painboy's Toughness (while it is on the battlefield).  The death of a Grot Orderly is ignored for the purposes of morale.  the Grot Oiler is considered to have the CHARACTER keyword for the purposes of shooting attacks.
